clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Observation of Technologic Application of No-touch Fluid-air Exchange in Surgery of Idiopathic Macula Hole
clinical_study.official_title: The Eye Hospital of Tianjin Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to observe the technologic application of no-touch fluid-air exchange in Surgery of Idiopathic Macula Hole.

arm_group.description: All patients in no-touch fluid-air exchange group will have a surgery of vitrectomy metrectomy and internal membrane peeling and gas tamponed.In this surgery ,investigator will not touch the macular area,especially the area of the macular hole and investigator will not have the fluid-air exchange of the macular area.

All patients in no-touch fluid-air exchange group will have a surgery of vitrectomy metrectomy and internal membrane peeling and gas tamponed.In this surgery ,investigator will touch the macular area and investigator will have the fluid-air exchange.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All patients were diagnosed as having an idiopathic macular hole(IMH) by Optical Coherence Tomography(OCT).
Exclusion Criteria:
- Myopia of >6 diopters
- Ocular trauma and other systematic or ocular issues associated with IMHsï¼Œsuch as the other macula disease, for example the degeneration of macula.
